title: Remove subscription and make app completely free for all users

requirements.summary: Remove any subscription, payment, or premium tier UI elements from all frontend components
acceptanceCriteria: No subscription prompts, payment buttons, or premium feature locks are visible in the UI
All messaging features remain accessible without any payment gates

file_operations.description: Review and remove any subscription or payment-related UI elements, state management, or conditional rendering based on subscription status from the root component
Remove any subscription badges, premium indicators, or upgrade buttons from the header component
Remove any subscription prompts, payment gates, or premium feature locks from the main messaging interface
Remove any message sending limits, premium feature checks, or subscription prompts that gate message input functionality
Remove any subscription-based restrictions on message editing or deletion, ensuring all users can edit and delete their own messages without limitations
Remove any subscription tier selection, payment prompts, or premium account creation options from the username entry screen

requirements.summary: Ensure all messaging features (send, edit, delete) are available to all users without any restrictions
acceptanceCriteria: Every user can send unlimited messages
Every user can edit and delete their own messages without restrictions
No usage limits or feature gates are enforced

file_operations.description: Remove any subscription validation, usage limit checks, or premium feature guards from the message operation hooks (send, edit, delete)
Ensure the message input component allows unlimited message sending without any subscription checks or usage counters
Ensure edit and delete actions are available for all users on their own messages without any subscription or premium tier validation
